All_Orders.query: query { bloodorderview { request_id first_name last_name blood_group status blood_bank_name creation_date_and_time delivery_date_and_time age } }

Order_Status.description: Get the status of a specific order by request ID.
Order_Status.query: query { bloodorderview { request_id first_name status blood_group status blood_bank_name creation_date_and_time delivery_date_and_time age } }

Pending_Orders.query: query { bloodorderview(where: {status: {_eq: "PA"}}) { request_id first_name last_name blood_group status blood_bank_name creation_date_and_time delivery_date_and_time age } }

Approved_Orders.query: query { bloodorderview(where: {status: {_eq: "AA"}}) { request_id first_name last_name blood_group status blood_bank_name creation_date_and_time delivery_date_and_time age } }

Rejected_Orders.query: query { bloodorderview(where: {status: {_eq: "REJ"}}) { request_id first_name last_name blood_group status blood_bank_name creation_date_and_time delivery_date_and_time age } }

Orders_By_Blood_Type.description: Get all orders for a specific blood type.
Orders_By_Blood_Type.query: query { bloodorderview { request_id first_name last_name blood_group status blood_bank_name creation_date_and_time delivery_date_and_time age } }

Orders_By_BloodBank.description: Get all orders from a specific blood bank.
Orders_By_BloodBank.query: query { bloodorderview { request_id first_name last_name blood_group status creation_date_and_time delivery_date_and_time age } }

Orders_By_Status_And_BloodBank.description: Get all orders for a specific blood bank with a specific status.
Orders_By_Status_And_BloodBank.query: query { bloodorderview { request_id first_name last_name blood_group status creation_date_and_time delivery_date_and_time age } }

Total_Orders_By_BloodBank.description: Get the total number of orders handled by a blood bank.
Total_Orders_By_BloodBank.query: query { bloodorderview { request_id first_name last_name blood_group status creation_date_and_time delivery_date_and_time age } }

Billing_Overview.description: Get cost and patient details for all blood banks.
Billing_Overview.query: query { costandbillingview { company_name month_year overall_blood_unit total_cost total_patient } }

Billing_By_Company.description: Get billing details for a specific hospital or company.
Billing_By_Company.query: query { costandbillingview { company_name blood_component total_cost overall_blood_unit month_year company_id } }

Cost_By_Blood_Component.description: Get the total cost for a specific blood component.
Cost_By_Blood_Component.query: query { costandbillingview { blood_component company_name total_cost month_year company_id } }

Total_Patients_By_Company.description: Get the total number of patients for a specific company.
Total_Patients_By_Company.query: query { costandbillingview { company_name total_patient month_year company_id } }

Blood_Usage_By_Company.description: Get the total blood units used by a specific company.
Blood_Usage_By_Company.query: query { costandbillingview { company_name overall_blood_unit month_year company_id } }

Recent_Orders.description: Get the most recent 10 blood orders.
Recent_Orders.query: query { bloodorderview(order_by: {request_id: desc}) { request_id first_name last_name blood_group status blood_bank_name creation_date_and_time delivery_date_and_time age } }

Bye.query: Thank you , let me know if there is anything else I can help you with.

greetings.query: { "Hello! How can I help you today?" }
